channel.title: Comments on: Next Week I’m In Eilat
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Every morning it says I'm in Eilat :) So how do you want me to update the blog?
item.content:encoded:
Every morning it says I’m in Eilat :)
So how do you want me to update the blog?

item.title: By: xtreeq
item.dc:creator: xtreeq
item.description: I realy hate this blog. I get up every morning and check for new updates... but they never come... nothing is written... hey mister... I need my blog shot... please write something... PleAse mister...
item.content:encoded:
I realy hate this blog.
I get up every morning and check for new updates… but they never come… nothing is written… hey mister… I need my blog shot… please write something… PleAse mister…

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: Hey asshole, did you know that when registering to your blog it doesn't send the email with the password.
item.content:encoded: Hey asshole, did you know that when registering to your blog it doesn’t send the email with the password.

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: :) She exists and as for your question: way ahead of you. My imaginary name is Ariel Cohen.
item.content:encoded: :) She exists and as for your question: way ahead of you. My imaginary name is Ariel Cohen.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: So now you're writing every day so we'll think that your imaginary reader really does exist. That's low. What's next? You are going to write comments using a new name.
item.content:encoded: So now you’re writing every day so we’ll think that your imaginary reader really does exist. That’s low. What’s next? You are going to write comments using a new name.

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Thanks :) So all the rest of the five readers....
item.content:encoded:
Thanks :)
So all the rest of the five readers….

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: I'm using RSS ;). Have fun in Eilat.
item.content:encoded: I’m using RSS ;). Have fun in Eilat.
